name: kmeans
description: Conversation block used to tune the hyperparameters for clustering kmeans algorithm

parameters.question: How many groups are you looking for? [Type a number between 2 and 10, or ask for help if you don't know]
parameters.help: It is usually hard to read a graph with more than 7-8 clusters and it might not give useful information, but there might be specific cases where you need to find more
